title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 869/91 of 9 April 1991 establishing the list of flint maize varieties on which production aid can be granted
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 869/91  of 9 April 1991  establishing the list of flint maize varieties on which prodution aid can be granted
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
The list of varieties provided for in Article 3 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1835/89 is annexed to this Regulation.  Article 2
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 April 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 180, 27. 6. 1989, p. 3. (2) OJ No L 365, 15. 12. 1989, p. 41. (3) OJ No L 56, 3. 3. 1990, p. 28.
ANNEX
List of varieties provided for in Article 3 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1835/89
Alfire
Asti
Astico
Capac M-788
Celtic Pau 230
Colom 92
DK-4-F-37
Erica
Freccia
Hibisco
Koala Adour 160
Monarque 282
Pampa
Platex
Platone
Ranuncolo
Samson
